pkgmetadata.longdescription: Smopy=====Give a box in geographical coordinates (latitude/longitude) and a zoom level,Smopy returns an OpenStreetMap tile image!Installation------------Smopy currently requires:* Pillow* NumPy* matplotlib* IPython (optional)To install Smopy run ``pip install smopy``.For IPython support run ``pip install smopy[ipython]``.To install Smopy directly from the repository clone the project and put the folder in your PYTHONPATH.Terms of use------------This module fetches image maps from `OpenStreetMap <http://www.openstreetmap.org/>`_'s servers.See the `Tile usage policy <http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tile_usage_policy>`_.In particular, **be careful not to retrieve large maps** as this can overload the servers.
